summary_detail.value: The National Weather Service has issued a RED FLAG WARNING for the area around the Meyers Fire. This is effective immediately through 9:00 pm Sunday. This is due to dry, unstable air and gusty winds to 30

title: Red Flag Warning Meyers Fire September 2-3, 2017 (Meyers Fire Wildfire)
